column1: #Text=Mako says : " The truck with Bolin took off down this alley . "
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra has to be in there ... somewhere .
#Text=" Mako says : " Let 's try this way .
#Text=" Asami says : " And what if Korra 's not down there ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Then we pick another tunnel until we find her !
